segments.text: I need to find a new place to live .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah ? Why ? Don ’ t you like living with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , it ’ s not you . I just want my own place .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Jeez ... I didn ’ t realize a single bedroom apartment went for so much these days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , prices have really gone up the past couple of years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , here ’ s one . It ’ s looks like its in this neighborhood , $ 600 a month . That ’ s not to bad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , it ’ s pretty good . Why not give the landlord a call ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hello . I ’ m calling about the one bedroom in Lincoln Park . Could I take a look at it ? Yes . Tonight at six is fine . Thanks .
segments.speaker: S1
